Home

Roberto Morán-Tovar

I am from Bogotá, Colombia, where I studied Physics and Biology (minor). Currently, I am a PhD student at M. Lässig group at the Institute for Biological Physics at the University of Cologne. In our group, we use methods from Statistical Physics to study biological phenomena ... always in the light of Evolution. More specifically, my current research is centered in understanding the coevolution of viruses and the adaptive immune sistem of vertebrates.

Póvoa de Varzim, Portugal. Camino portugués de la costa hacia Santiago de Compostela. 2020
